name: Five Nights at Freddy's RM2K3
description:
You play as security officer in freddy fazbear's fizzeria, ur task is to survive there for one night.

---------------------------------------------------

Things you can do in game:

-Play through story

-Play through survival mode (currently in development)

-View gallery (currently in development)

---------------------------------------------------

Game takes about 10min to complete ;)

Game can contain some bugs (this game will be often updated)

This game is not based on fnaf lore

Note: this game can be played on android devices using EasyRPG.
